profile:
The Home Improvement People have completed literally thousands of renovations since our inception. We are a unique award winning contracting company, consulted by various media as industry experts. 
Please view our website at homeimprovementpeople.com to view images of some of our projects. 
For our clients' convenience, we've implemented progress billing as well as financing.
Regardless of scope, we approach every single home renovation with a foundation of strong design aesthetics, comprehensive product options, sound project management, and a commitment to craftsmanship.
 
Our projects range from remodelled bathrooms and kitchens, to rear additions,  hardwood flooring, basements, second story additions and other extensive renovations. We undertake work in all budget ranges.
 
Choosing a reputable contractor is the most important decision you will make regarding your renovation. From plans and permits, to last little finishing details, The Home Improvement People is committed to completing your renovations and home improvements in a professional manner and to your complete satisfaction.
We take pride in our personalized service and our high quality workmanship. 
Call us for quality, insured work - completed on time, and on budget.
416-782-7605.

AGM Renovations experts provide quality basement and Bathroom Renovation services throughout the GTA and the surrounding area. See our Service Area for the complete list of towns where our  renovation services are offered. We offer 100% satisfaction guarantee on our workmanship and offer competitive prices with exceptional quality.

Expect more and when you need the best; trust AGM Renovations. We guarantee that you will be completely satisfied, which means that you don't pay until you are satisfied.
Our mission is to be committed to excel in the work we do. We are committed to excel and maintain a sense of pride in our all we do!

products: AGM Renovations, Basement finishing, Basement Renovations, Basement Reno, Finishing Basements, Basement Company, Finished Basements, Basement Expert, Finished Basements Company, Bathroom Renovations
services:
AGM Renovations offers Complete basement and Bathroom renovations packages from the professional design through the professional cleaning including:

Drywall- We employ only professional drywall installers and our goal is deliver complete satisfaction to each and every client with the quality of our workmanship and our prompt, reliable service.
    
Taping- Our drywall taping techniques will bring a high quality smooth finish, with a level of excellence you will take pride in.

Painting- We include all wall priming, painting of ceilings, baseboards, casing, crown and cove moldings into our basement construction packages
    
High Grade Laminate Flooring- is standard in our basement renovations packages.

Tiling- Shower, bathroom, or kitchenette tiling will be done by professional tile installers who are employed directly by AGM. A 2 year unlimited warranty is provided to you standard when you finish your basement with AGM
   
Plumbing- Our licensed plumbers will ensure that no problem is left unsolved and you can be sure that any drain or other plumbing defects left by the original house builder will be fixed effectively.

Electrical- We are committed to providing fully licensed electrician service as part of our standard package. Should you ever require an electrical certificate when you decide to sell your property, we will be happy to provide it to you

profile:
Techno Kitchen Refacing is an Ontario based kitchen renovation company that specializes in refacing, rather than replacing. Recently, we brought on another member to the team to supply the increasing demand. Now, we can serve you faster, and across a larger area.

Techno's word-of-mouth marketing philosophy shows how happy customers have been with the product. Honesty and customer satisfaction are of the utmost concern for Techno and the customer will benefit every time.

Want to see it for yourself? Our customers are so happy and enthusiastic about the work that they've allowed us to invite you into their homes to see firsthand the quality of the work. Call today and ask how to arrange a meeting with Frank.
service_area: Stoney Creek, Hamilton, Grimsby, St. Catherine's, Niagara, Welland, Burlington, Oakville, Milton, Georgetown, Halton Hills, Caledon, Mississauga, Brampton, Toronto, Etobicoke, Scarborough, North York, Markham, Ajax, Pickering, Richmond Hill, Oshawa, Vaughan, Woodbridge, Barrie, Muskoka, Kitchener, Cambridge, Waterloo, Guelph, Ayr, Orangeville, Flamborough, Waterdown
hours: Tuesday to Friday 10 am - 5 pm Saturday 10 am - 4 pm
products:
Why Choose Techno?
Full Satisfaction Guarantee! Real wood doors and veneer in several different stains, colors and species! No plastic, no paper, no cheap looking laminate! We're a member of the Better Business Bureau! You work directly with the owner who will be personally involved in making your dream kitchen a reality!
services: Cabinet repainting, cabinet refacing and custom-built cabinetry and entertainment units.
specialities:
*WE SPECIALIZE IN REAL WOOD*
After 15 years of experience in the woodworking and cabinetry industry, Techno founder Frank Silletti chose to start his own refacing company with the goal of giving homeowners in Ontario a more affordable alternative to traditional kitchen remodeling. Frank says "By using the cabinet refacing process, we are able to dramatically cut down the time, cost and inconvenience of building and creating your dream kitchen". With the experience and the motivation to back his work, you can be sure Frank will be there to answer any questions or concerns to deliver the best value and quality of work available. Please feel free to visit the contact page and fill out an information request form. We look forward to hearing from you!
name: Techno Kitchen Refacing

profile:
For 25 years, Canlik has been the premier Kitchen Refacing Specialist in Greater Toronto Area. It's kitchen upgrade solutions are custom to fit individual family needs, New Kitchens or Refacing Kitchens, they are more personal, flexible, affordable and environmental friendly. Since 1990, Canlik’s principal has been the same – delivering high quality products and services. No pushy sales. Consultants focus on providing honest and unbiased suggestions so that home owners can make the right decisions. Kitchen projects can be overwhelming and confusing – but it does not have to be if customers chose Canlik Kitchens. 
 
Details on our solutions: - 
 
(A) Kitchen Refacing,
Canlik’s very popular "Premier Kitchen Refacing” aims at delivering custom kitchen looks with fraction of the cost. It uses the existing infrastructure and replaces exterior elements, like the cabinet doors, gable and fillers. It reduces wastage and helps avoid hidden costs. Kitchen Refacing solution has been providing great alternatives for those who want to achieve their renovation goals with less effort, less risk and have their budget under control.
 
(B) Custom New Kitchens 
“Canlik Custom Kitchens” allow home owners fully utilize limited spaces because cabinets are custom built to fit spaces. It can handle challenging space issues that "Modular kitchens" can hardly address. It also makes preserving the existing layouts and the foot prints possible, so that the flooring and other elements are not affected. Storage efficiency is achieved by detail oriented cabinet configurations design and adding effective accessories, if necessary.

profile:
Paint Core Finishes is a custom refinishing company. We provide top-notch kitchen cabinet, vanity, woodwork and furniture re-spraying, refinishing and painting services in the GTA.

Reclaim your kitchen cabinets, vanities, and woodwork!

We believe in doing things right the first time. We specialize in the fine art of cabinet refinishing, painting, re-spraying and wood finishing. If you have a tired looking kitchen and are thinking of replacing it, think twice. We have salvaged hundreds of kitchens with our factory finish process. We pride ourselves on producing high quality finishes on all your existing cabinetry, millwork and furniture. By implementing a very thorough preparation, combined with the right application systems, topnotch equipment and coatings we provide amazing results. This is our recipe for success!

Our philosophy is that a refinished kitchen shouldn’t look refinished; it should look like it was bought that way.

www.paintcore.ca
services:
- Solid Color Refinishing
- On-Site Refinishing
- Furniture Re-Spraying
- Speciality Finishes
- Wood Finishing
- Pre Finishing

profile:
MacLeans Custom Kitchens is family owned and operated.

All of Macleans Custom Kitchens reviews are authentic, unedited, and written directly by our customer.

We design quality Kitchens and handle complete renovations from floor to ceiling. 

In the early 1990's, brothers Terry and Dave MacLean, second generation cabinet builders, opened their showroom/workshop in Pickering, making the move to Bowmanville in 2004.

Macleans Custom Kitchens offers one stop shopping with 6 different kitchen displays in our showroom and a huge selection of colours and door styles for your kitchen or vanity. We have a large selection of ceramic tile, granite, quartz and laminate samples.

As part of our free estimate service, from measurements taken at your home, we offer computer assisted designs. We can produce a floor plan and 3D images that can be viewed in our showroom. Written estimates are free to take home.

Whether we custom build, or order your cabinets from one of carefully selected, Canadian suppliers, we guarantee only the finest quality products and workmanship and generous warranties. Rip-out, disposal and installation and all necessary, plumbing, electrical and appliance hook-ups are all included in our pricing - there are no surprises.

Each project is done by or closely overseen by the owners personally. From start to finish, your renovation is our top priority, and we will work within your busy schedule to complete the job in a timely fashion. 


Our business has been built on word-of-mouth referrals and repeat customers, based on our solid practical knowledge, honesty, experience and courteous service. We look forward to being able to add you to our list of satisfied customers!

Our services include:
Full Service Kitchen Renoations
*Custom Cabinets
*Made to Order Cabinets and Vanities- cash and carry for your installation
*Ceramic Tile


*Granite / Quartz Countertops

profile:
Bathroom Renovation, Kitchen Renovation, Basement Renovation

Our process begins in the comfort of your home with a complimentary consultation. A qualified renovator will take you through our virtual gallery showing off hundreds of inspirational ideas featuring real kitchen & bathroom renovations we have completed, or are capable of offering. Have something else in mind? Splendid! We are sleuths at sourcing hard-to-find products. Together, we’ll discover functional solutions and fashionable options that suit your tastes. Once this process is complete, we’ll present you with a quote and a comprehensive plan encompassing the layout, products and details of your renovation.

As soon as you give us the green light to begin your project, we will prepare a detailed contract and a comfortable payment schedule.Then you can sit back and leave the rest to us! One of our Project Managers will coordinate with our team of skilled drywallers, carpenters, plumbers and electricians so that your dream kitchen or bathroom renovation runs smoothly. In our experience, dealing with one person is much easier for you and ensures the job is done right – the first time!

During the renovation process, rest assured we will treat your home as if it was our own. From drop sheets to vent filters, we’ll create a “bubble” around the project area to keep the space clean with minimal disruption to your household. Upon completion of the project, a cleaning crew will ensure your new kitchen or bathroom is pristine – ready to enjoy immediately – and for years to come.

For added peace of mind, we are proud to guarantee all our Toronto kitchen and bathroom renovation work for 5 years. That’s our commitment and it’s what makes the Kitchen & Bath Guys the definitive choice for discriminating homeowners… like you!

profile:
Our Services
FREE ESTIMATION K-Wood is pleased to offer free, no obligation estimates! Our qualified design consultants are ready to assistant you in every step of your project and can accurately cost out all elements to ensure there are no surprises. Visit them at our newly developed showroom today! Our showroom is open to the public weekdays from 9:00 am to 6:00 pm and Saturdays 9:00 am to 5:00 pm.
 
Kitchen Cabinetry and Design
At K-Wood, we have over 20 years’ experience designing or remodeling new kitchen spaces and manufacturing custom cabinetry for thousands of happy clients. Our experience and familiarity with the industry is vast, making us well-suited to take on any project regardless of its complexity. Whether you are looking to gain more space or build the kitchen of your dreams, trust that the specialists at K-Wood will deliver results that are beyond your expectations.
 
Bathroom Cabinetry and Design
Our team of trusted design and manufacturing professionals can offer you expert advice in improving the functionality and atmosphere of your bathroom while recommending the best materials for your design objectives. Our experienced team has successfully designed and installed thousands of bathrooms in a wide array of spaces for many delighted customers.


Renovation Services
The K-Wood team includes highly skilled and trained renovation specialists who are all licensed in their respective trades. Together with our in-house designers, they are always aware of the industry's newest trends to bring our customers only the best. Our team of renovation specialists has a large array of industry experience, from basement development to new foyers, and endeavour to elevate the experience each of our clients gets out of their home. 

TRY OUR VIRTUAL KITCHEN AND BATH DESIGNER TODAY AT kwoodkitchens.com



K-Wood Kitchens Inc. specializes in custom designs in the following:
- Kitchen Remodeling
- Bathroom Remodeling
- Custom Built Cabinetry
- Home Renovation
